Record.ParentTerm: Gene Transfer or Gene Delivery Agent
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Agent/Gene Transfer or Gene Delivery Agent/pNGVL3-hIL12
Record.BroaderTerm: Gene Transfer or Gene Delivery Agent
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A plasmid vector encoding interleukin-12 (IL-12) with potential use in the gene therapy of cancer. pNGVL3-hIL12 may induce a high level of IL-12 protein expression during transient transfection of host cells. IL-12 is a proinflammatory cytokine with numerous immunoregulatory functions and may augment host immune responses to tumor cells. (NCI04)
